attributes.action: Save the Grange School in Runcorn from closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government plans to revolutionise learning facilities for every child were last night hailed a 'once in a lifetime' opportunity. 
Halton Borough Council is planning to 'federate' two schools on both sides of the River Mersey, resulting in the closure of the Grange School in Runcorn by 'relocating' the pupils to the Heath school. The plan is for this to happen by 2013. 
This petition is for parents, pupils past,present and of the future to petition the Government against closing this excellent school in the interests of money, and not the Community. Please register your support to keep the school open by signing this petition.
